name: Box Run (itch) (3riple)
description:
A simple game where you play as a box and avoid obstacles.

The game is very similar to runner type games and only contains 3 levels.

To skip to certain levels, click numbers 1 - 3 on the main menu screen to go to a specific level.

Controls:

A = move left

D = move right

Code:  https://github.com/Triple3Apple/Simple-Obstacle-Game

( ͡ʘ ͜ʖ ͡ʘ)
